data_table.description: Physical Function Tests, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified subject ID [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX1
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q1. Single chair stand attempted [This is a test of strength and stability in your legs] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX2
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q2. Repeat chair stands attempted [This time I want you to stand up five times as quickly as you can] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX2A
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q2a. Number of completed chair stands [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX2B
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q2b. Time to complete 5 chair stands (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX3
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q3. Semi-tandem stand attempted [I would like you to try to stand with the side of the heel of one foot touching the big toe of the other foot for 10 seconds] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]
variable.value: Unable to attain position or hold for one second
Holds position greater than or equal to 1 but less than 10 seconds

variable.name: PFX3A
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q3a. Time holding semi-tandem stand (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX4
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q4. Side-by-side stand attempted [I would like you to try to stand with your feet together, side-by-side, for 10 seconds] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]
variable.value: Unable to attain position or hold for one second
Holds position greater than or equal 1 but less than 10 seconds

variable.name: PFX4A
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q4a. Holds position for 10 seconds [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX5
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q5. Tandem stand (trial 1) attempted [I would like you to try to stand with the heel of one foot in front of and touching the toes of the other foot for 10 seconds] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]
variable.value: Unable to attain position or hold for one second
Holds position greater than or equal 1 but less than 10 seconds

variable.name: PFX5A
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q5a. Time holding tandem stand (trial 1) (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX6
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q6. Tandem stand (trial 2) attempted [Physical Function Tests, PFX]
variable.value: Unable to attain position or hold for one second
Holds position greater than or equal 1 but less than 10 seconds

variable.name: PFX6A
variable.description: B. Standing Balance. Q6a. Time holding tandem stand (trial 2) (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX7
variable.description: C. 4 Meter Walk. Q7. 4-M walk (trial 1) attempted [Normal Pace Walk] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX7A
variable.description: C. 4 Meter Walk. Q7a. 4-M walk with aid time (trial 1) (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX7B
variable.description: C. 4 Meter Walk. Q7b. 4-M walk without aid time (trial 1) (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX8
variable.description: C. 4 Meter Walk. Q8. 4-M walk (trial 2) attempted [Normal Pace Walk] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX8A
variable.description: C. 4 Meter Walk. Q8a. 4-M walk with aid time (trial 2) (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX8B
variable.description: C. 4 Meter Walk. Q8b. 4-M walk without aid time (trial 2) (secs) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX9
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q9. Pain or arthritis present in hand or wrist [Normal Pace Walk] [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX9A
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q9a. Identify hand or wrist in pain or arthritis [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX9B
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q9b. Pain or arthritis gotten worse recently [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX9C
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q9c. Pain or arthritis would prevent squeezing [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX10
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q10. Undergone surgery on hand/wrist in past 3 months [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX10A
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q10a. Identify hand or wrist that underwent surgery [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX11A
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q11a. Hand used for grip test [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX11B
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q11b. Grip strength result (trial 1) (kg) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX11C
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q11c. Grip strength result (trial 2) (kg) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX11D
variable.description: D. Grip Strength. Q11d. Grip strength completion status [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0a. Completion date [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX2B_DER
variable.description: Time for 5 completed stands: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX3A_DER
variable.description: Time for holding position: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX4A_DER
variable.description: Time for holding position: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX5A_DER
variable.description: Time for holding position: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX6A_DER
variable.description: Time for holding position: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX7A_DER
variable.description: Time to complete with walking aid: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX7B_DER
variable.description: Time to complete without walking aid: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX8A_DER
variable.description: Time to complete with walking aid: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]

variable.name: PFX8B_DER
variable.description: Time to complete without walking aid: (derived) [Physical Function Tests, PFX]
